Depth Shader Test(Distance)èµ„æºåŒ…
è¯¥èµ„æºåŒ…çš„æ•ˆæœæœ‰ç‚¹è¿‡äº[ruby=dizzy]ç›®çœ©ç¥è¿·[/ruby]ï¼Œè¯·è‡ªè¡Œå°è¯•
ä¼šä»¥æ‘„åƒæœºä¸ºä¸­å¿ƒï¼Œæ¯éš”1æ–¹å—è·ç¦»çš„ç‚¹è¿›è¡Œç€è‰²ï¼Œç±»ä¼¼åŒå¿ƒåœ†ã€‚

#version 110

uniform sampler2D DiffuseSampler;
uniform sampler2D DiffuseDepthSampler;

uniform vec2 ScreenSize;
uniform float _FOV;

varying vec2 texCoord;

float near = 0.1; 
float farÂ Â = 1000.0;

float LinearizeDepth(float depth) 
{
Â  Â  float z = depth * 2.0 - 1.0;
Â  Â  return (near * far) / (far + near - z * (far - near));Â  Â  
}

void main() {
Â  Â  float depth = LinearizeDepth(texture2D(DiffuseDepthSampler, texCoord).r);
Â  Â  float distance = length(vec3(1., (2.*texCoord - 1.) * vec2(ScreenSize.x/ScreenSize.y,1.) * tan(radians(_FOV / 2.))) * depth);
Â  Â  if (mod(distance, 1.0) <= 0.05) {
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â gl_FragColor = vec4(1.0,0.0,0.0,0.1);
Â  Â  } else {
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â gl_FragColor = vec4(texture2D(DiffuseSampler, texCoord).rgb, 1.0);
Â  Â  }
}

#version 110

uniform sampler2D DiffuseSampler;
uniform sampler2D DiffuseDepthSampler;

uniform vec2 ScreenSize;
uniform float _FOV;

varying vec2 texCoord;

float near = 0.1; 
float farÂ Â = 1000.0;
Â Â 
float LinearizeDepth(float depth) 
{
Â  Â  float z = depth * 2.0 - 1.0;
Â  Â  return (near * far) / (far + near - z * (far - near));Â  Â  
}

void main() {
Â  Â  float depth = LinearizeDepth(texture2D(DiffuseDepthSampler, texCoord).r);
Â  Â  if(depth < 10.0) gl_FragColor=texture2D(DiffuseSampler,texCoord);
Â  Â  else gl_FragColor=vec4(0.0,0.0,0.0,1.0);
}
